used IN PLACE OF altwallet arguments

Altwallet1 is for NVIDIA1,AMD1,ASIC, and CPU

To use (Step 1): Replace 'add coin symbol here' with symbol of wallet

To use (Step 2): Add address of that coin. Set pools to use.

notes.7: You can continue to add to the list, but only 1 wallet per pool. See bottom for example

notes.8: Warning: If anything below is modified, SWARM will start using this file.

notes.9: (Optional) You can add all wallets in AllAltWallets section-

notes.10: SWARM will scan if auto-coin is on and AllAltWallets sectoin if filled.

notes.11: If a coin matched the address symbol, and most profitable, it will mine to that wallet
